{{navbar|:NanoPi models|text=NanoPi models}} ===Models=== :;[[NanoPi series]] • [[Amlogic]] • [[Allwinner]] • [[Rockchip]] • [[Samsung]] {{SCollapse2|NanoPi • >> | *[[NanoPi]] - ''[[Samsung]]'' S3C2451 (ARM926EJ) CPU @400MHz *[[NanoPi 2]] - ''[[Samsung]]'' S5P4418 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A9) CPU @1.4GHz *[[NanoPi 2 Fire]] - ''[[Samsung]]'' S5P4418 • 4x ARM Cortex-A9) CPU @1.4GHz *[[NanoPi Fire 2A]] - ''[[Samsung]]'' S5P4418 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A9) CPU @1.4GHz *[[NanoPi Fire 3]] - ''[[Samsung]]'' S5P6818 • 8x ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU @1.4GHz *[[NanoPi S2]] - ''[[Samsung]]'' S5P4418 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A9) CPU @1.4GHz {{----}} *[[NanoPi A64]] - ''[[Allwinner]]'' A64 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU @1.2GHz *[[NanoPi Duo]] - ''[[Allwinner]]'' H2+ • 4x ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1.2GHz *[[NanoPi Duo2]] - ''[[Allwinner]]'' H3 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1.2GHz *[[NanoPi K1 Plus]] - ''[[Allwinner]]'' H5 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A53) @816MHz *[[NanoPi K2]] - ''[[Amlogic]]'' S905 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU @1.5GHz {{----}} *[[NanoPi R1]] - ''[[Allwinner]]'' H3 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1.2GHz *[[NanoPi R1S-H3]] - ''[[Allwinner]]'' H3 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1GHz *[[NanoPi R1S-H5]] - ''[[Allwinner]]'' H5 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU @1.2GHz *[[NanoPi R2C]] - ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3328 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU @1.5GHz *[[NanoPi R2C Plus]] - ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3328 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU @1.5GHz *[[NanoPi R2S]] - ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3328 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU @1.5GHz *[[NanoPi R2S Plus]] - ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3328 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU @1.5GHz *[[NanoPi R4S]] - ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3399 (big.LITTLE) • [[NanoPi R4S (4GB)]] • [[NanoPi R4SE]] :CPU: 2x ARM (Cortex-A72) @2.0GHz + 4x ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.5GHz *[[NanoPi R5C]] - ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3568 • [[NanoPi R5C (4GB)]] :CPU: 4x ARM (Cortex-A55) @2.0GHz; GPU: Mali-G52 MP2 EE <!-- :RAM: 4GB (LPDDR4X); Storage: 32GB (eMMC) Flash :LAN: 2x 2.5GbE (RJ45) ports (2x Realtek RTL8125BG PCIe controller) :Wi-Fi: [[AzureWave AW-CB375NF]] Realtek RTL8822CE (802.11ac M.2) --> *[[NanoPi R5S]] - ''[[Rockchip]]'' [https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/12/16/rockchip-rk3566-and-rk3568-datasheets-and-features-comparison/ RK3568] • [https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/05/30/buy-nanopi-r5s-rockchip-rk3568-mini-router-sbc/ Spec.] • [https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/06/02/nanopi-r5s-router-review-part-1-unboxing-openwrt-and-iperf3-benchmarking/ Teardown] :CPU: 4x ARM (Cortex-A55) @2.0GHz; GPU: Mali-G52 MP2 EE <!-- :RAM: 2GB (LPDDR4X), Storage: 8GB (eMMC) Flash :LAN: 2x 2.5GbE (RJ45) ports (2x Realtek RTL8125BG PCIe controller) :WAN: 1x 1GbE (RJ45) port (Realtek RTL8211F), USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports --> *[[NanoPi R6C]] - ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3588S (big.LITTLE) • GPU: Mali-G610 MP4, VPU :CPU: 4x ARM (Cortex-A76) @2.4GHz + 4x ARM (Cortex-A55) @1.8GHz <!-- :RAM: 4/8GB (LPDDR4X-2133 Dual-Channel); LAN: 1x 1GbE, 1x 2.5GbE --> *[[NanoPi R6S]] - ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3588S (big.LITTLE) • GPU: Mali-G610 MP4, VPU :CPU: 4x ARM (Cortex-A76) @2.4GHz + 4x ARM (Cortex-A55) @1.8GHz <!-- :RAM: 8GB (LPDDR4X-2133 Dual-Channel); LAN: 1x GbE, 2x 2.5GbE --> {{----}} *[[NanoPi M1]] - ''[[Allwinner]]'' H3 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1.2GHz *[[NanoPi M1 Plus]] - ''[[Allwinner]]'' H3 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1.2GHz *[[NanoPi M2]] - ''[[Samsung]]'' S5P4418 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A9) CPU @1.4GHz *[[NanoPi M2A]] - ''[[Samsung]]'' S5P4418 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A9) CPU @1.4GHz *[[NanoPi M3]] - ''[[Samsung]]'' S5P6818 • 8x ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU @1.4GHz *[[NanoPi M4]] - ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3399 (big.LITTLE) • GPU: Mali-T864, VPU :CPU: 2x ARM (Cortex-A72) @2.0GHz + 4x ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.5GHz :[[NanoPi M4 (2GB)]] • [[NanoPi M4 (4GB)]] • [[NanoPi M4V2]] • [[NanoPi M4B]] {{----}} *[[NanoPi NEO]] - ''[[Allwinner]]'' H3 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1.2GHz *[[NanoPi NEO Air]] - ''[[Allwinner]]'' H3 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1.2GHz *[[NanoPi NEO Core]] - ''[[Allwinner]]'' H3 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1.2GHz *[[NanoPi NEO Core2]] - ''[[Allwinner]]'' H5 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU @816MHz *[[NanoPi NEO Plus2]] - ''[[Allwinner]]'' H5 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU @816MHz *[[NanoPi NEO2]] (1GB) - ''[[Allwinner]]'' H5 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU @816MHz :• [[NanoPi NEO2]] • [[NanoPi NEO2 (512MB)]] • [[NanoPi NEO2 (1GB)]] *[[NanoPi NEO2 Black]] - ''[[Allwinner]]'' H5 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU @1.5GHz *[[NanoPi NEO3]] - ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3328 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU @1.5GHz *[[NanoPi NEO4]] - ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3399 (big.LITTLE) • GPU: Mali-T864, VPU :CPU: 2x ARM (Cortex-A72) @2.0GHz + 4x ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.5GHz) {{----}} <!-- :[[NanoPC series]] --> *[[NanoPC-T1]] - ''[[Samsung Exynos]]'' 4412 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A9) CPU @1.5GHz *[[NanoPC-T2]] - ''[[Samsung]]'' S5P4418 • 4x ARM (Cortex-A9) CPU @1.4GHz *[[NanoPC-T3]] - ''[[Samsung]]'' S5P6818 • 8x ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU @1.4GHz *[[NanoPC-T3 Plus]] - ''[[Samsung]]'' S5P6818 • 8x ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU @1.4GHz *[[NanoPC-T4]] - ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3399 (big.LITTLE) • GPU: Mali-T864, VPU :CPU: 2x ARM (Cortex-A72) @2.0GHz + 4x ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.5GHz <!-- :RAM: 4GB (LPDDR3-1866 Dual-Channel); Flash: 16GB (eMMC 5.1) --> *[[NanoPC-T6]] - ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3588 (big.LITTLE) • GPU: Mali-G610 MP4, VPU :CPU: 4x ARM (Cortex-A76) @2.4GHz + 4x ARM (Cortex-A55) @1.8GHz <!-- :RAM: 4/6/16GB (LPDDR4X-2133 Dual-Channel);
